com.intel.device.api.sensor

Interface SensorController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncSensorController, FightClubSensorController, PhoneSensorController

    public interface SensorController
    SensorController provides sensor management for a Sensor Enabled Device (SED).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enqueueConnectSensor(SensorToken token, SensorConnectionCallback callback)
      Establish a connection with the specified sensor.
      void enqueueDisconnectSensor(SensorToken token, SensorNoParameterCallback callback)
      Disconnect from the specified sensor.
      void enqueueGetConnectedSensors(ResultCallback<java.util.Set<SensorInfo>> callback)
      Gets the connected sensors.
      void enqueueGetSelectedSensors(ResultCallback<java.util.Set<SensorInfo>> callback)
      Gets the selected sensors.
      void enqueueGetSensorCalibration(SensorToken sensorToken, ResultCallback<SensorCalibrationConfig> callback)
      Get sensor calibration for the specified sensor
      void enqueueGetSensorState(SensorToken token, ResultCallback<SensorState> callback)
      Gets the sensor state.
      void enqueueSelectExternalSensor(SensorToken token, SensorNoParameterCallback callback)
      Select the specified external sensor.
      void enqueueStartSensorCalibration(SensorCalibrationConfigRequest sensorCalibrationConfig, SensorNoParameterCallback callback)
      Start sensor calibration
      void enqueueStartSensorDiscovery(SensorDiscoveryCallback callback)
      Start sensor discovery.
      void enqueueStopSensorCalibration(SensorToken sensorToken, SensorNoParameterCallback callback)
      Stop sensor calibration for the specified sensor
      void enqueueStopSensorDiscovery(NoParameterCallback callback)
      Stop sensor discovery.
      void enqueueSubscribeSensorCallback(SensorToken token, SensorConnectionCallback callback)
      Adds a sensor connection callback.
      void enqueueUnselectExternalSensor(SensorToken token, SensorNoParameterCallback callback)
      Unselect the specified external sensor from the wearable.
      void enqueueUnsubscribeSensorCallback(SensorConnectionCallback sensorConnectionCallback)
      Removes a sensor connection callback.

                                 SensorToken token,
                                 @NonNull
                                 SensorNoParameterCallback callback)
